name: 3DRobotBabyPlattformer
description:
Alpha of speedruning plattformer where you play the 3Dbaby robot.
This is very early alpha and no sound, just trying out some of the mechanics in a small course. Game will be updated! Enjoy!

Collect all the carrots and get to goal with the best possible time!

Controls:

Camera: Mouse

W, S: Forward/Backward

Right Mouse button (hold) - Follow camera to steer.

scrollwheel - zoom in and out.

A+D - strafe - very limited

Shift - Boost

Space - Short Jump

Hold Space - High jump

esc - quit

F - Activate small green boxes.
